races.name: Human

traits.name: Bonus Feat
traits.description: Humans select one extra feat at 1st level.

traits.name: Skilled
traits.description: Humans gain an additional skill rank at first level and one additional rank whenever they gain a level.

races.description: Humans are the most adaptable and ambitious people among the common races. Whatever drives them, humans are the innovators, the achievers, and the pioneers of the worlds.

races.name: Elf

traits.name: Low-Light Vision
traits.description: Elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

traits.name: Elven Immunities
traits.description: Elves are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

traits.name: Elven Magic
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance. +2 racial bonus on Spellcraft skill checks made to identify the properties of magic items.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Elves are proficient with longbows, longswords, rapiers, and shortbows, and treat any weapon with the word 'elven' in its name as a martial weapon.

races.description: Elves are a race of graceful, long-lived humanoids known for their connection to nature and magic.

races.name: Dwarf
races.speed_note: Dwarves are never slowed by armor or encumbrance

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Dwarves can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

traits.name: Defensive Training
traits.description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

traits.name: Greed
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Appraise skill checks made to determine the price of nonmagical goods that contain precious metals or gemstones.

traits.name: Hatred
traits.description: +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the orc and goblinoid subtypes.

traits.name: Hardy
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against poison, spells, and spell-like abilities.

traits.name: Stability
traits.description: +4 racial bonus to CMD when resisting a bull rush or trip attempt.

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: +2 bonus on Perception checks to notice unusual stonework. Receive a check to notice such features whenever within 10 feet.

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Dwarves are proficient with battleaxes, heavy picks, and warhammers, and treat any weapon with 'dwarven' in its name as a martial weapon.

races.description: Dwarves are a stoic but stern race, ensconced in cities carved from the hearts of mountains.

races.name: Halfling

traits.name: Small
traits.description: +1 size bonus to AC, +1 size bonus on attack rolls, -1 penalty to CMB and CMD, +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

traits.name: Fearless
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear.

traits.name: Halfling Luck
traits.description: +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Climb skill checks.

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Halflings are proficient with slings and treat any weapon with 'halfling' in its name as a martial weapon.

races.description: Halflings are nimble, optimistic people who form tight-knit communities in the shadow of larger folk.

races.name: Gnome

traits.name: Small
traits.description: +1 size bonus to AC, +1 size bonus on attack rolls, -1 penalty to CMB and CMD, +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

traits.name: Low-Light Vision
traits.description: Gnomes can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

traits.name: Defensive Training
traits.description: +4 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the giant subtype.

traits.name: Gnome Magic
traits.description: +1 to the DC of any saving throws against illusion spells. Gnomes with a Charisma of 11 or higher also gain spell-like abilities.

traits.name: Hatred
traits.description: +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the reptilian and goblinoid subtypes.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

traits.name: Obsessive
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on a Craft or Profession skill of their choice.

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Gnomes treat any weapon with 'gnome' in its name as a martial weapon.

races.description: Gnomes are whimsical, curious folk with a connection to the First World and a passion for discovery.

races.name: Half-Elf

traits.name: Low-Light Vision
traits.description: Half-elves can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

traits.name: Adaptability
traits.description: Half-elves receive Skill Focus as a bonus feat at 1st level.

traits.name: Elf Blood
traits.description: Half-elves count as both elves and humans for any effect related to race.

traits.name: Elven Immunities
traits.description: Half-elves are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells and effects.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

traits.name: Multitalented
traits.description: Half-elves choose two favored classes at first level and gain +1 hit point or +1 skill point whenever they take a level in either one of those classes.

races.description: Half-elves combine the best qualities of both parent races, but often feel isolated from both societies.

races.name: Half-Orc

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: Half-orcs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

traits.name: Intimidating
traits.description: +2 racial bonus on Intimidate skill checks.

traits.name: Orc Blood
traits.description: Half-orcs count as both humans and orcs for any effect related to race.

traits.name: Orc Ferocity
traits.description: Once per day, when a half-orc is brought below 0 hit points but not killed, he can fight on for one more round as if disabled.

traits.name: Weapon Familiarity
traits.description: Half-orcs are proficient with greataxes and falchions and treat any weapon with 'orc' in its name as a martial weapon.

races.description: Half-orcs combine human ambition with orcish fury. They often struggle to find acceptance in either society.
